item.title: Exterritorial Trailer
item.description: Trailer for upcoming Netflix action movie Exterritorial

item.title: If You're Already Nervous About AI, Here Are 10 Movies You Should Avoid At All Costs
item.description: The growing applications and power of AI can scare many of us, and some great sci-fi movies should be avoided for their extreme depictions of AI.

item.title: New Netflix Action Movie Trailer Has 1 German Badass Fighting An Entire US Embassy (Who Are The Bad Guys)
item.description: A brand new trailer for an upcoming Netflix action movie called Exterritorial shows a German person fighting against an entire US Embassy.
